Enums/RequestError.html#/s:5Relax12Reque.name: otherHTTP(request:status:)
Enums/RequestError.html#/s:5Relax12Reque.abstract: Another HTTP error status code occurred (besides 400, 401, 404, and outside the 200-399 success code range)

Protocols/ServiceRequest.html#/s:5Relax1.name: pathComponents
Protocols/ServiceRequest.html#/s:5Relax1.abstract: Path components of the request will be appended to the base URL.

Protocols/ServiceRequest.html#/s:5Relax1.name: queryParameters
Protocols/ServiceRequest.html#/s:5Relax1.abstract: Query parameters of the request. Default is an empty array (no parameters)

Protocols/ServiceRequest.html#/s:5Relax1.name: headers
Protocols/ServiceRequest.html#/s:5Relax1.abstract: HTTP headers of the request. Default is an empty array (no headers)

Protocols/ServiceRequest.html#/s:5Relax1.name: contentType
Protocols/ServiceRequest.html#/s:5Relax1.abstract: The content type of the request. The default is application/json.

Protocols/ServiceRequest.html.name: ServiceRequest
Protocols/ServiceRequest.html.abstract: A protocol for requests to be made on a Service.

Enums/RequestError.html.name: RequestError
Enums/RequestError.html.abstract: An error that occurs when making a ServiceRequest

Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.name: baseURL
Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.abstract: The base URL of the service. This value is shared among all endpoints on the service.

Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.name: session
Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.abstract: The URLSession that requests to this service will use.

Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.name: Response
Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.abstract: Completion handler based response for an HTTP request

Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.name: PublisherResponse
Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.abstract: Response for an HTTP request using a Combine publisher

Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.name: request(_:session:autoResumeTask:completion:)
Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.abstract: Make a request using the given ServiceRequest and parameters

Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.name: request(_:session:)
Protocols/Service.html#/s:5Relax7Service.abstract: Make a request using a Combine publisher.

Protocols/Service.html.name: Service
Protocols/Service.html.abstract: A protocol to define a REST API service
